Wrong Step.name: Wrong Step
Wrong Step.flavor: Your enemy steps unwittingly into your trap, and you catch him by surprise with a sudden, paralyzing thrust.
Wrong Step.trigger: An adjacent enemy shifts or moves
Wrong Step.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.

Slasher's Mark.name: Slasher's Mark
Slasher's Mark.flavor: You fortify yourself, raise your weapons, and carve scarring wounds into the flesh of your enemies.
Slasher's Mark.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Slasher's Mark.special: You can spend a healing surge before attacking.
Slasher's Mark.effect: The target is marked until the end of the encounter. Make a secondary attack.
Slasher's Mark.secondaryTarget: One creature other than the primary target
Slasher's Mark.secondaryeffect: The target is marked until the end of the encounter.
